page.title: 10Farming 5: The Future
page.content:
All the farms in this area are owned by the Eastbourne Corporation. Most are held by farming tenants who do not think that their farms have much of a future as they have no control over decisions made by the Corporation. There is some public pressure to persuade the Corporation to get rid of the farms and to let the land grow as natural downland. If this happens all the animals will have to go and the pastures will become overgrown with scrub. However, local farmers believe that they are safe for one more generation as the Corporation is also committed to developing land at Hampden Park for recreation.
The above information on farming is based on an interview with Mr Williams Bullockdown Farm.
